Package nzilbb.ag

Interface IGraphStoreAdministration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGraphStore, IGraphStoreQuery
    public interface IGraphStoreAdministration
extends IGraphStore
    Interface for administration of a graph store, including definition of layers, registration of converters, etc.
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz
